actions.text: Amendment SA 3582, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 26. Record Vote Number: 244.
Amendment SA 3582 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S5021-5026, S5037; text: CR S5021) To modify the provisions relating to revenue.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3582, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 26. Record Vote Number: 244.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3582, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 26. Record Vote Number: 244.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3582 proposed by Senator Wyden.

purpose: To modify the provisions relating to revenue.
